desc: A one stop shop in Buderim, Maleny & online for all your furniture painting and upcycling needs. Hand painted furniture sales, furniture painting service plus Annie Sloan Chalk Paint Stockist, Iron Orchid Designs & Saltwash®️. A huge selection of Hardware available for all your door handle & door knob needs.

layout.text: Welcome to your one stop upcycling shop!

Whether you’re transforming your furniture, painting your patio, dying your cushions or adding texture & embellishments to your garden pots, we have all the products you need!
Visit our two shops in Buderim & Maleny in the beautiful Sunshine Coast, QLD
